title: Palindrome String
description:
A string is a palindrome if it reads the same forward and backward.

Given a string s, determine if it is a palindrome. For this problem, we consider only alphanumeric characters and ignore cases.
task:
Check if the input string is a palindrome.
Return 1 if it is a palindrome, and 0 otherwise.
inputFormat: Line 1:s — the string to check (may contain spaces)
sampleInput:
// Input string

racecar
sampleExplanation: 'racecar' read backward is 'racecar', which is identical to the original.
hints: A simple way is to reverse the string and compare it to the original.
For better space efficiency, use two pointers: one starting at the beginning and one at the end.
Move the pointers toward the center, comparing characters at each step.
